data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to do/make/act/work/operate/perform/construct/manufacture, practice a handcraft, be active, one who does.
data.sentence: The word يَعْمَلُونَ comes from the root ع م ل and is associated with the meanings: to do/make/act/work/operate/perform/construct/manufacture, practice a handcraft, be active, one who does.

data.meanings: Pay/give/render a satisfaction, make sufficient, pay a debt, to contend, repay/requit/compensate, to recompense.
data.sentence: The word جَزَاءً comes from the root ج ز ي and is associated with the meanings: Pay/give/render a satisfaction, make sufficient, pay a debt, to contend, repay/requit/compensate, to recompense.
